label: Joy
column3: expansive feeling of pure delight and pleasure.

label: Disgust
description: A strong feeling of revulsion or disapproval

label: Surprise
column3: brief feeling of being startled or amazed by the unexpected.

label: Shame
column3: shrinking feeling of humiliation or unworthiness.

label: Guilt
description: A heavy feeling of responsibility or regret for a wrong action.

label: Pride
column3: confident feeling of satisfaction in an achievement.

label: Envy
column3: yearning feeling of wanting what someone else has.

label: Jealousy
column3: possessive feeling over a threatened relationship.

label: Grief
column4: often following a loss; sadness amplified.

label: Hope
column3: optimistic feeling of expectation and desire for a positive future.

label: Loneliness
column3: aching feeling of isolation and longing for connection.

label: Gratitude
column3: warm feeling of thankfulness and appreciation.

label: Anxiety
column3: knotted feeling of nervousness and apprehension about the future.

label: Contentment
column3: calm feeling of quiet satisfaction and ease.

label: Nostalgia
column3: longing feeling for a fondly remembered past.

label: Awe
description: An overwhelming feeling of wonder and reverence
